location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, to Henry Willock, in Charge of His Majesty's Mission, Tabrize [TabrÄ«z]

mods.abstract: In this letter James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, acknowledges the receipt of Henry Willock's packets, dated 9 and 19 January 1824 respectively, and states that they will be sent to Bombay tomorrow. Riach regrets that he does not have sufficient sealing wax to send to Willock.
